[{
	"resource": "/c:/Users/andre/prjtcs/word_scrambler_ac/src/components/Block.js",
	"owner": "eslint",
	"code": {
		"value": "react-hooks/exhaustive-deps",
		"target": {
			"$mid": 1,
			"external": "https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/14920",
			"path": "/facebook/react/issues/14920",
			"scheme": "https",
			"authority": "github.com"
		}
	},
	"severity": 4,
	"message": "React Hook useEffect contains a call to 'setBackgroundColor'. Without a list of dependencies, this can lead to an infinite chain of updates. To fix this, pass [text, phrase, index, setCorrectAns, correctAns, color] as a second argument to the useEffect Hook.",
	"source": "eslint",
	"startLineNumber": 13,
	"startColumn": 5,
	"endLineNumber": 13,
	"endColumn": 14
}]
